member_organisations: No organizations are members of Match-Maker Ventures
fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: We follow the developments of Startup Europe Activities under the Digital Single Market.
membership: Match-Maker Ventures is not a member of any associations or such
goals__remit:
Match-Maker Ventures accelerates innovation by fundamentally changing how corporates and startups collaborate. We maximize the success of the innovation journey and create impact within 12 months for both corporates and startups.  
Our unique network approach enables startups to scale fast by connecting startups to the global markets and corporates to benefit from pre-selected, globally scouted and well prepared innovation. By involving our global Match-Maker network we create “perfect matches” and ensure impact being created by managing the process end-to-end, from start-up sourcing to on-boarding.  
We work with leading-edge start-ups who already have achieved proof-of-concept and are ready to scale their business and large corporates willing to learn from start-ups.  
We focus on industries where we possess a deep understanding and a broad network: Telecoms, Media and Financial Services.
